main.name: Joshua King
main.description: Professional developer with a passion for software quality

resume.skillmessage: T-shaped engineer with a focus on software quality.

education.description: Applied ML to Computer Vision applications on long-term video sequences.  Also taugh Intro to Programming in C++ for one semester.
Participated in ICPC for 2 years.  Senior capstone involved a large amount of systems engineering to create a cyber security sandbox.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Brought on as a member of the Platform Team to aid in CI/CD test automation, help with library updates and dev tooling improvements.  Also served as a temporary member to other engineering teams in Product-oriented roles to help during crunch, which involved creating back-end services with Golang and front-end components with Angular.

work.title: SDET
work.description: Focused on BDD test automation with Gherkin on the Core Platform Team.  Maintained a handful of high throughput microservices, handling authentication and location services for the site.  Acted as a skunkworks for new engineering processes or tools to enhance developer productivity.
